questions.question: Which statement best describes how an interpreter works according to the notes?
options: It translates the entire source code into object code before execution
It executes the source code directly, one line at a time
It produces an executable file for later use
It analyzes code without executing it
questions.answer: It executes the source code directly, one line at a time

questions.question: What is produced when a program is executed using an interpreter?
Why must an interpreter be used every time a program is executed?
options: Because object code expires after execution
Because no object code is produced
Because the source code is deleted after execution
Because error messages replace the program output
questions.answer: Because no object code is produced

questions.question: Which disadvantage of an interpreter is explicitly stated in the notes?
options: Slower execution due to repeated interpretation
questions.answer: Slower execution due to repeated interpretation

questions.question: Match each interpreter characteristic with its correct description.

pairs.Execution model: Runs one line at a time

questions.question: Which statement correctly describes a compiler according to the notes?
options: It executes the program while compiling
It translates and executes code line by line
It does not execute the program during compilation
It requires recompilation before every execution
questions.answer: It does not execute the program during compilation

questions.question: With a compiler, the program source code is input and either the _____ or error messages are output.
What can be done with object code produced by a compiler?
options: It must be interpreted line by line
It can be executed without recompilation
questions.answer: It can be executed without recompilation

questions.question: How is a compiler structurally divided according to the notes?
The compiler front end performs _____ of the source code.
What is produced by the front end if no errors are found?
What does the intermediate code represent according to the notes?
options: The syntax of the source code only
The semantics of the source code
questions.answer: The semantics of the source code

questions.question: What is the role of the compiler back end?
options: Translating intermediate code into object code
questions.answer: Translating intermediate code into object code
